game.author: dibesfer
game.name: blank

game.title: Blank

long_description: If a mod depends on "default" of Minetest Game only to use the default sound effects included in Minetest Game, this mod provides all the default sound effects to be used in any game on the Luanti engine. Meaning, a mod that would otherwise depend on Minetest Game, simply to use it's sound effects, can be now used outside of Minetest Game, in other games. This makes such mods game agnostic. Using this mod assumes that "default" is not installed, and that you are playing some other game than Minetest Game. Don't use this if you are playing Minetest Game, as Minetest Game already comes with all of these sound effects in the included "default" module.
name: default_sounds_for_other_games
short_description: mods that only depend on "default" for sounds, can be made to use this mod to source the sounds from
title: default sounds for other games
